articles.description:
RT nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | Graph Day 2022
Today you can already build a true decentralized & censorship-resistant YouTube
- @ArweaveTeam + @BundlrNetwork video storage 
- @LensProtocol social graph + discoverability 
- @graphprotocol querying (subgraph needs to be built)
- @Livepeer streaming 
- @SpheronHQ web hosting

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Sam Williams 🐘
Almost 70 million documents about the war in Ukraine have now been permanently stored in the Arweave network.
These records are stored in hundreds of places across the world, backed by an endowment, with no centralized points of failure.
Blockchains are not just for finance.
